cleaned_text: Electronic Arts (EA) U.S. corporate demography 2022, by ethnicity and role [In March 2022, only 3.3 percent of U.S. Electronic Arts (EA) employees in leadership position were African American or Black. As of end of the fiscal year 2022, the](#statisticContainer) [number of EA employees](/statistics/269694/electronic-arts-number-of-employees/)had reached approximately 12,900 full-time staff.
